name: Tyrannosaurus Tech
description:
Tyrannosaurus Tech is a web & mobile app development and innovative design company in Atlanta, GA. We are a team of innovative designers and top-tier developers that thrive on solving complex problems, designing elegant solutions, and providing maximum ROI for our customers. Through our own proven, transparent, and collaborative agile process, we help companies leverage technology to tackle their biggest challenges.
We humanize the development process and clarify the complex undertaking of bringing an idea to life. Working closely with our clients, we determine a clear path forward towards success and continued growth. Put simply, our team combines passion with superior technical talent to create one of a kind web and mobile products.
READ MORE...
